2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Finally managed to make an account.

8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Is there a way to disable the zerohello button in the top-right corner of each site? I believe that's slowing down my browser significantly.

> [markdunce](#comment_1_1H12MuvP4JeeK74scutN2fbNbUbdSgZ1Lz): how do you create multiple identities and switch between them?

Click on your name on top of the comment box to change your ID. You can also change your identity address by dragging the zeronet icon on the top right to the left. This allows you to make a new ZeroID.
